docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Welcome to the Investor Relations Textbook.

This section provides a high-level overview of the textbook structure, with links to each chapter.

  • Chapter 1 – Introduction to Investor Relations
  • Chapter 2 – Stakeholder Communication
  • Chapter 3 – Financial Reporting & Disclosure
